choices.D: Configure the Host firewall to allowlist the specific IP addresses
choices.B: Configure a Containment Policy with the specific IP addresses
choices.C: Configure a Containment Policy with the entire internal IP CIDR block
choices.A: Configure a Real Time Response policy allowlist with the specific IP addresses

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
Going with B , tested in UI

Selected Answer: B
B is correct
I would go with B as the requirement is to allow specific internal IP addresses and not the entire internal IP CIDR block.

Selected Answer: B
The B is the correct answer, when a host is contained the firewall policy is not working.
If you add a standar firewall rule, how can the product to know wich rules apply in containment status? The answer is defining the firewall containment firewall rules in a differente place, in this case is defined in the containment pollicy.
B >> Correct Answer - Tested in LAB
